Author: untildivorcedouspart
Text: Haha haha don’t worry I get you , honestly I don’t go on vacation as it causes me too much anxiety that I will break with my exercise and food routine and fuck everything up and ruin everything I’ve worked for. I tell me friends i can’t join them as I’m too poor and I’m an adult so I don’t have to join my fam on their vacations but I could go for free. But I would rather not. Someone was saying how they wished they had anorexia and I was thinking “firstly da fuk and secondly, really, you want the prospect of a vacation to stress u out so much that you don’t go ??”
